revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=PK5001Z |revision=(CenturyLink) |asin=B008O91ZCQ |fcc_date=02/08/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=MitraStar |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=I88PK5001Z |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 50810;XWAY ARX168 (PSB 50810 EL V1.2); |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0D-SCB0 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ProMOS |ram1_model=V58C2512164SDI5 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5362F |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8306M |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=CenturyLinkXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^CenturyLink[0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''randomly generated'' |oui=B0:B2:DC |oui_eth=B0:B2:DC }} {{TagLine|DSL Modem for CenturyLink Phone Line and Internet Service}} :[http://qwest.centurylink.com/internethelp/modem-pk5001z.html Product page] :[http://qwest.centurylink.com/internethelp/pdf/modems/datasheet-pk5001z.pdf Datasheet]
*[http://archive.is/2014.06.11-055809/https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=43210 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] (w/ a board image, specs, etc) :"45-402-000613" is silkscreened on the board.
*[[ZyXEL PK5001Z]] (CenturyLink-branded) [http://www.edn.com/design/consumer/4441923/Teardown--Inside-a-DSL-gateway Teardown] :ADSL: [[Lantiq]] PSB 50810 EL (XWAY ARX168 ADSL2+ CPE) :Flash: Samsung K9F1G08U0D (1Gbit NAND flash memory) :RAM: ProMOS V58C2512164 (512Mbit DDR SDRAM) :WLAN: [[Ralink]] RT5362F (2T2R 2.4GHz 802.11n, 5dBi ant.)) :Switch: [[Realtek]] RTL8306M
Per a label on eBay... *The WPA/WPA2 PSK and admin password are randomly generated. *The default SSID format seems to be '''CenturyLinkXXXX''' :(where '''XXXX''' is the last 4 digits of the serial number). *A B0:B2:DC OUI is used for at least some devices. :US: 1RODL02BPK5001Z
==Images== ===from CenturyLink=== [[File:PK5001ZXL.jpg|320px]][[Has images::external| ]]
